title: Construct Target Array With Multiple Sums
content:
Given an array of integers . From a starting array,  consisting of all 1's, you may perform the following procedure :

let  be the sum of all elements currently in your array.
choose index , such that  and set the value of  at index  to .
You may repeat this procedure as many times as needed.

Return True if it is possible to construct the  array from  otherwise return False.
